description:
After Effects Tutorials: The Complete After Effects CC Text & Shapes Animation Course.

** Course Updated March 2016 ***

* Students Reviews

Happily animating away! Any designer can open After Effects and replicate a cool text animation off YouTube. However, if want to think like an animator, you need to build a strong foundation by learning the basics and practicing! If you're looking for a great introduction to After Effects look no further. I'm very happy with the quality of instruction from this course. Thanks, Louay! ... Kirsten Lindquist Campana

Text animation mastering. If you want to learn text animation this is the course. Amazing value and well explained courses. This teacher is a pro on it... George Matsos

*

Text Animation or Kinetic Typography is becoming increasingly valuable and important in any video created. Learning how to create these animations using After Effects has become essential. Talents to create these kind of animations are more and more in demand. It is also an easy way to earn money as a freelancer or resell your packaged animations on hundreds of sites on the web.

Learn and Master Kinetic Typography in After Effects in this Comprehensive Course:

  • Understand the concepts behind Animation Techniques
  • Master Adobe After Effects for Text Animations
  • Manipulate all transformations basic and beyond
  • Create Animations from scratch
  • Learn easy, yet powerful, techniques to create the most complex animations


Mastering Kinetic Typography in After Effects

Learning the fundamentals and beyond of Kinetic Typography using Adobe After Effects is a very powerful tool at your fingertips.

You will go through building working animations and learn how to manipulate all transformations. This is not the type of ‘Tips and Tricks’ here and there course. This Course is a serious learning experience where you get to actually create practical animations and genuinely learn how to use After Effects and become a master animator.

Contents and Overview

You will start with a fast track to get familiar with After Effects. You will then learn all about the essential transformations using practical animations and real examples. You will build animations from scratch and practically learn more about numerous features and functions of After Effects.

You will go through projects where you will learn how to create animation sequences and package a whole movie.

Essential manipulation of the many methods in after affects are covered with emphasis on practical use and not just an overview of methods.

Most importantly throughout the course the spirit of Kinetic Typography and how to put together text animations is thoroughly covered. This will be your most important learning experience. How to Imagine, Create, and Manage all the tools for you to become a Master Animator.
title: After Effects CC: Master Motion Graphics In After Effects
